PSCT.Base: During the Main Phase: Fusion Summon 1 "Myutant" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling the Fusion Materials listed on it into the Deck, from among your cards on the field, in your GY, and/or your face-up banished cards. You can only activate 1 "Myutant Cry" per turn.
